trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> This timid lady looks to you imploringly.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_TODO_00<tab>Search for the despondent man.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_TODO_01<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “seek the sun” to the despondent man.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the timid lady.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_000<tab>Please, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>... You have to stop my husband.

TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_001<tab>Ever since the Autarch declared an end to blessed siblings, my husband has been overcome with grief. When I woke this morning, he was nowhere to be found.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_002<tab>A neighbor saw him heading to Cenote Jayunja, but I am too weak to follow him.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_003<tab>Please, stop him from crossing the cenote. Find him and tell him to “seek the sun.” He'll remember himself, I'm sure.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_004<tab>I can't lose my husband, not after... Please, stranger. Find him and tell him to “seek the sun.” He was seen headed towards Cenote Jayunja.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_HOOBIGOHASBAND05105_000_005<tab>You! Y-You're the Third Promise's...
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_HOOBIGOHASBAND05105_000_006<tab>Leave me be. I'm going to meet them. They're calling for me...

TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_HOOBIGOHASBAND05105_000_007<tab>Ever since we decided to abandon our teachings, I've been able to <var 1A 02 /var>hear<var 1A 01 /var> them. Their young, bright voices... Calling me to the Skydeep Cenote...

TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the words “seek the sun” to stop the despondent man from proceeding any further.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_HOOBIGOHASBAND05105_000_009<tab>Wait for me, little ones. Father is coming...

TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>The despondent man pays you no heed. With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the words “seek the sun” to stop him from proceeding any further.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_SAYTODO_000_011<tab>seek the sun
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_HOOBIGOHASBAND05105_000_012<tab>H-How do you know that phrase...?
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_HOOBIGOHASBAND05105_000_013<tab>My wife? Of course.

TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_HOOBIGOHASBAND05105_000_014<tab>In Mamook, the faithful tell each other to “seek the sun” during our darkest moments. As a reminder not to become discouraged, to look up to the light that awaits us in the forests above. Now my wife would have me lift my head again...
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_HOOBIGOHASBAND05105_000_015<tab>...I must return to Mamook. I need to speak with her.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_016<tab>My husband arrived home safely. Thank you, stranger. Thank you.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_017<tab>...I'm sure you noticed, but our union was arranged in accordance with the old teachings.

TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_018<tab>After everything we gave and everything we lost, the news that it would amount to nothing was too much for my husband to bear. The children he might have reared still haunt him...as they do me.
TEXT_KINGZD106_05105_QUIETBOONEWA05105_000_019<tab>It is mourning we must endure together, as partners. I hope we can now at least put our grief to words...
